original_text: (And the Lord gave Israel a saviour, so that they went out from under the hand of the Syrians: and the children of Israel dwelt in their tents, as beforetime.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이에 구원자를 이스라엘에게 주시매 이스라엘 자손이 아람 사람의 손에서 벗어나 전과 같이 자기 장막에 거하였으나

sentences.original_text: And the Lord gave Israel a saviour
from under the hand of the Syrians
and the children of Israel dwelt in their tents
